lead_paragraph: Chelsea defender Baba Rahman has joined Bundesliga side Schalke 04 on a season-long loan, the two clubs announced on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Rahman Joins Schalke on Season-Long Loan
headline.main: Chelsea's Rahman Joins Schalke on Season-Long Loan
